title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local LLMs with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for CodeLlama, Vicuna, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM conversations to any server.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and Blazor samples.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to cache and serve Ollama models inside CI pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation stack using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for iOS/macOS apps wanting local LLM power via Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A using Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package downloaded 200k+ times; same features as ollama-js repo.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package with 150k+ monthly downloads; mirrors ollama-python repo.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, mods, benchmarks, and troubleshooting Ollama setups.
